entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 15. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Showers ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 60 in the evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
